item.title: AngularJS with gulp, wiredep and bower
item.description: With this blog post I want to show you how to use AngularJS with gulp, wiredep and bower to provide the files to an angular application. I introduced Gulp in my AngularJSDemoApp on GitHub. Check it out here. AngularJS with gulp wiredep and bower gulp.js var gulp = require('gulp'); var jshint = require('gulp-jshint'); var jscs = require('gulp-jscs'); var del = require('del'); var inject = require('gulp-inject'); var config = require('./gulp.config')(); gulp.task('vet', function () { return gulp .
